title: mandagamane ivan
sahitya:
mandagamane ivan yAre pElamma mandaradhara gOvinda kANamma


caraNam 1    kendaLiru nakha shashibimba pada padma anduge iTTavan yAre pELamma 
andu kALingana peDeya tuLida diTTa nandana kanda mukunda kANamma
    caraNam 2    uDuge pItAmbara naDuge honnuDudAra kaDaga kankaNa viTTavan yAramma 
maDadi kEL sakala lOkangaLa kukSiyoLoDane tOrida jagadoDeya kANamma
    caraNam 3    nIrada nIladantesava vakSadi kEyurava hAravaniTTavan yAramma 
nIre kELu nirjararAdavarige prEsiri balavittudAri kANamma
    caraNam 4    shankha cakravu gade padma kaiyoLagiTTalankarisuvanItan yAramma 
pankaja mukhi shrI bhUdEviyara rasanu shankeyillade gOpi tanaya kANamma
    caraNam 5    kambu kandhara karNAlambida kuNDala ambuja mukhadavan yAre hELamma 
rambhE kELIta purandara viTTala nambida bhaktara kuTumbi kANamma
